message.name: XRV_SUBGOAL_AND_PROGRESS_INDICATOR_ALREADY_LINKED
message.locale: The subgoal %1s is already linked to the progress indicator %2s.

message.name: FV_SUBGOAL_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A subgoal must be specified for the SubGoalProgressIndicator link.

message.name: FV_PROGRESS_INDICATOR_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A progress indicator must be specified for the SubGoalProgressIndicator link.
